name: The Gift (itch) (jtn191)
description:
You're a gift on the day before Christmas

Use WASD or the arrow keys to navigate your way and interact with anything colored white!

Made in less than one day for the 2018 Itch.io Christmas Jam

Please rate at https://itch.io/jam/christmas-jam-2018/rate/349102

My first Bitsy project! Enjoy
